elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about your apprenticeship contract and your apprenticeship position.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What formal requirements apply to the conclusion of an apprenticeship contract?
elements.correctAnswer: The apprenticeship contract must be in writing.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Who signs the apprenticeship contract?
elements.correctAnswer: The apprentice; in the case of minors: legal representative, training company/vocational training provider

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What is the role of the Cantonal Office for Vocational Education and Training?
elements.correctAnswer: The Cantonal Office for Vocational Education and Training approves the apprenticeship contract and checks the content of the apprenticeship contract.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: List four points that must be regulated in the apprenticeship contract.
elements.correctAnswer: Type of vocational training, vacations and time off, duration of apprenticeship, probationary period, working hours, salary.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: How long is the probationary period?
elements.correctAnswer: 1-3 months (maximum six months under special circumstances).
